social.thread

Class ThreadManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • social.thread.ThreadManager

  • public class ThreadManager
extends java.lang.Object
    The ThreadManager class deletes threads from a wall
    Version:
    1.0 07 Apr 2020
    Author:
    Brian Goh

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ThreadManager()
      Creates a new ThreadManager with a default Thread and Tagged DM

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean checkCanKill(Thread thread, User user)
      Check if the thread is kill-able by user, which is when the user is either 1.
      boolean deleteThreadCompletely(Thread thread)
      Deletes the specified thread completely from the database
      boolean deleteThreadFromWall(Thread thread, User user)
      Deletes the specified thread from the user's wall if he is tagged in the thread or if it is posted on his wall by his friend or both
      boolean isOwnerOfPost(Thread thread, User user)
      Checks if the user is the owner of the thread
      boolean isReceiverOfPost(Thread thread, User user)
      Checks if the user is a receiver of the thread
      boolean isTagged(Thread thread, User user)
      Checks if the user is one of those tagged in the thread

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • ThreadManager

        public ThreadManager()
        Creates a new ThreadManager with a default Thread and Tagged DM

    • Method Detail

      • checkCanKill

        public boolean checkCanKill(Thread thread,
                            User user)
        Check if the thread is kill-able by user, which is when the user is either 1. owner of thread, 2. receiver of thread or 3. tagged in the thread
        Parameters:
        thread - the Thread object to check
        user - the User object to check if valid to kill thread
        Returns:
        true if user is valid to kill thread, false otherwise

      • isTagged

        public boolean isTagged(Thread thread,
                        User user)
        Checks if the user is one of those tagged in the thread
        Parameters:
        thread - the Thread object to check
        user - the User object to check if tagged
        Returns:
        true if tagged in thread, false otherwise

      • isReceiverOfPost

        public boolean isReceiverOfPost(Thread thread,
                                User user)
        Checks if the user is a receiver of the thread
        Parameters:
        thread - the Thread object to check
        user - the User object to check if receiver
        Returns:
        true if receiver of the thread, false otherwise

      • isOwnerOfPost

        public boolean isOwnerOfPost(Thread thread,
                             User user)
        Checks if the user is the owner of the thread
        Parameters:
        thread - the Thread object to check
        user - the User object to check if owner
        Returns:
        true if owner of the thread, false otherwise

      • deleteThreadCompletely

        public boolean deleteThreadCompletely(Thread thread)
        Deletes the specified thread completely from the database
        Parameters:
        thread - the Thread object
        Returns:
        true if successfully deleted, false otherwise.

      • deleteThreadFromWall

        public boolean deleteThreadFromWall(Thread thread,
                                    User user)
        Deletes the specified thread from the user's wall if he is tagged in the thread or if it is posted on his wall by his friend or both
        Parameters:
        thread - the Thread object
        user - the User object of user
        Returns:
        true if successfully removed thread from user's wall, false otherwise.
